BTCUSD.title: U.S. tech giants reached $20.8 trillion market cap, surpassing the EU‚Äôs $19.4 trillion GDP milestone
BTCUSD.body: The Magnificent 7 collectively reached a combined market capitalization of $20.8 trillion, surpassing the EU‚Äôs GDP of $19.4 trillion. The GDP of the European Union stood at USD 19.42 trillion in 2024 and was expected to increase slightly to over USD 19.65 trillion in 2025. The European Commission revealed that the spring forecast projected real GDP growth in 2025 at 1.1% in the EU and 0.9% in the euro area, broadly the same rates attained in 2024 Magnificent 7 dominate global markets Nvidia reported a market valuation of $4.3 trillion, $165.2 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, and $115.4 billion in gross profit. Microsoft reported a market valuation of $3.85 trillion. In the fourth quarter of FY2025, Microsoft‚Äôs sales totalled $76.4 billion, representing an 18% increase over the previous year. Net income increased 24% to $27.2 billion, while operating income increased 23% to $34.3 billion. At $3.65, diluted earnings per share represented a 24% increase over the previous year. As of October 2, Apple had a market value of $3.78 trillion, bolstered by $190.7 billion in gross profit and $408.6 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, which yielded an annualized return of 17.52% over the past five years. Google‚Äôs Alphabet had a market valuation of $2.95 trillion, $371.4 billion in revenue, and $218.9 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 27.07%. Amazon had a market valuation of $2.34 trillion, $670.0 billion in revenue, and $332.4 billion in gross profit. Amazon has a 6.39% five-year return. Meta also reported a market valuation of $1.84 trillion, $178.8 billion in revenue, and $146.5 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 22.61%. As of October 2, Tesla‚Äôs market value stood at $1.48 trillion, bolstered by $16.2 billion in gross profit and $92.7 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, with a five-year annualized return of 24.38%. Global leaders warn as tech giants drive valuations beyond fundamentals üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ Over 50% of the US market cap is now pure Tech. Defensives have collapsed to under 15%. This isn‚Äôt diversification ‚Äì it‚Äôs a Tech Empire üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ $tsla $nvda $google $appl #Bitcoin $qqq pic.twitter.com/taa4SxxSME ‚Äî Hod | Code2Capital (@HodTzdaka) October 3, 2025 David Solomon, CEO of Goldman Sachs, warned on Friday at Italian Tech Week in Turin, that an AI investment frenzy may be overdone and that stock markets are due for a ‚Äúdrawdown.‚Äù Solomon said major US stock indexes have notched record high after record high this year on the promise of artificial intelligence. He argued that there‚Äôs a good chance that not all of those investments will deliver big returns. He noted that the internet craze of the late 1990s and early 2000s drew a frenzy of investment in tech companies at the time. Solomon reminded the crowd that the internet craze was followed by a dramatic collapse, which is commonly known as the ‚Äúdot-com bubble‚Äù. ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if in the next 12 to 24 months, we see a drawdown with respect to equity markets.‚Äù David Solomon , Goldman Sachs CEO Jeff Bezos referred to the AI investment wave as an ‚Äúindustrial bubble.‚Äù He also emphasized that innovation stemming from such AI investment cycles can still yield long-term advantages. According to Bezos, the market is seeking the next big breakthrough, reminiscent of the dynamics of previous bubbles. He added that the previous bubble dynamic is why many small AI ventures with weak foundations receive investment. On October 3, Dario Perkins, TS Lombard‚Äôs Managing Director of Global Macro Research, raised an alarm when he noticed that big tech companies were increasingly using off-balance-sheet loans and special purpose entities (SPVs) to finance AI equipment. According to Perkins, this is a ‚Äúrecognition that this is getting out of hand.‚Äù Perkins emphasized that the real leverage and risk exposure of businesses like Meta, which has requested $29 billion in private finance for the expansion of its AI data centre, are concealed by such borrowing techniques. Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

BTCUSD.title: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs Pull in $3.2B, Could Signal Move Toward Breakout
BTCUSD.body: Bitcoin ETFs pulled in $3.24 billion in the first week of October, driving large institutional demand and pushing BTC toward the $125,000 resistance. This surge ‚Äî including a near $1 billion daily inflow ‚Äî signals renewed allocation to Bitcoin from investors anticipating a Federal Reserve rate cut. $3.24B total ETF inflows in first week of October $1B nearly one-day inflow reversed prior $900M outflow Analyst targets: JPMorgan $165k, Standard Chartered $135k‚Äì$200k, Citigroup $132k Bitcoin ETFs pull in $3.24B in early October, sparking renewed institutional buying and driving BTC toward $125K ‚Äî read the latest market signals and analyst forecasts. What caused Bitcoin ETF inflows to surge to $3.2B? Bitcoin ETF inflows surged as institutional investors returned after a weak September, driven by optimism for an ‚ÄúUptober‚Äù rally and a sharply higher probability of a near-term Federal Reserve rate cut. The inflows included one of the largest single-day ETF deposits, signaling renewed capital allocation into BTC. How large were the flows and what do they mean for price action? U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs registered about $3.24 billion in net inflows during the first week of October, with nearly $1 billion entering on Friday alone. This reversed a roughly $900 million outflow from the previous week and coincided with Bitcoin briefly touching $124,000, placing $125,000 as the next clear resistance. { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "NewsArticle", "headline": "Bitcoin ETFs Hit $3.2B in Flows, Setting the Stage for a Breakout", "datePublished": "2025-10-04T22:05:00Z", "dateModified": "2025-10-04T22:05:00Z", "mainEntityOfPage": { "@type": "WebPage", "@id": "https://en.coinotag.com/bitcoin-etfs-hit-3-2b-flows" }, "author": { "@type": "Organization", "name": "COINOTAG", "url": "https://en.coinotag.com" }, "publisher": { "@type": "Organization", "name": "COINOTAG", "url": "https://en.coinotag.com", "logo": { "@type": "ImageObject", "url": "https://en.coinotag.com/logo.png" } }, "description": "Bitcoin ETFs pulled in $3.24B in early October, sparking renewed institutional buying and pushing BTC toward $125K as analysts update targets.", "keywords": "Bitcoin ETFs, Bitcoin ETF inflows, BTC price, Uptober, institutional adoption"} Why did institutions return to Bitcoin funds now? Institutions cited macro drivers and portfolio rebalancing. Futures markets are pricing in more than a 90% chance of a Federal Reserve policy easing, which historically favors alternative stores of value like Bitcoin. Wealth managers and financial advisors reported renewed client interest in crypto exposure. What are major banks forecasting for Bitcoin? Major banks have revised targets upward: JPMorgan projects $165,000 by year-end, Standard Chartered sets nearer-term targets of $135,000 with upside to $200,000 before 2026 if ETF demand persists, and Citigroup raised its target to $132,000. These projections were shared in institutional research notes and public commentary. How should investors interpret ETF flow data? ETF flows offer a near-real-time gauge of institutional demand. A sustained inflow trend typically precedes broader price appreciation as new capital increases liquidity and lowers volatility for large buy orders. How to monitor ETF-driven momentum (step-by-step) Track daily and weekly net flows for spot Bitcoin ETFs. Compare flows with on-chain metrics (exchange reserves, open interest). Monitor macro signals (Fed minutes, rate-cut probabilities) for directional bias. Watch resistance levels ($125K) and volume confirmation for breakout validation. { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "HowTo", "name": "How to interpret Bitcoin ETF inflows", "description": "Steps for investors to use ETF flows to assess Bitcoin market momentum and risk.", "step": [ { "@type": "HowToStep", "name": "Check ETF net flows", "text": "Review daily and weekly inflows and outflows for spot Bitcoin ETFs to identify demand trends." }, { "@type": "HowToStep", "name": "Cross-check on-chain indicators", "text": "Compare ETF flows with exchange reserves and futures open interest for liquidity signals." }, { "@type": "HowToStep", "name": "Factor in macro conditions", "text": "Monitor monetary policy expectations and risk-on sentiment to assess sustainability." }, { "@type": "HowToStep", "name": "Set tactical price levels", "text": "Use resistance and support (e.g., $125K resistance) to plan entries and stops." } ]} When could inflows trigger a sustained breakout? A sustained breakout is more likely if ETF inflows remain consistently positive week-over-week and price breaks and holds above the $125,000 resistance on strong volume. Confirmation would include shrinking exchange reserves and expanding derivatives open interest in the same direction. Frequently Asked Questions How much did Bitcoin ETFs net in the first week of October? Bitcoin ETFs netted approximately $3.24 billion in the first week of October, including a near $1 billion daily inflow on Friday that reversed a prior $900 million outflow. Will ETF inflows guarantee a price rally to new highs? ETF inflows increase the probability of price appreciation but do not guarantee new highs; market confirmation requires sustained flows, healthy volume, and supportive macro conditions like an easing Fed. { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "FAQPage", "mainEntity": [ { "@type": "Question", "name": "How much did Bitcoin ETFs net in the first week of October?", "acceptedAnswer": { "@type": "Answer", "text": "Bitcoin ETFs netted about $3.24 billion in the first week of October, including a roughly $1 billion single-day inflow that reversed the previous week's outflows." } }, { "@type": "Question", "name": "Do ETF inflows mean Bitcoin will hit new all-time highs?", "acceptedAnswer": { "@type": "Answer", "text": "ETF inflows increase upward pressure on price and can support a rally, but a new all-time high requires sustained capital, volume confirmation, and supportive macro conditions." } } ]} Key Takeaways Immediate impact : $3.24B weekly inflow pushed BTC near $124,000 and set $125,000 as near-term resistance. Institutional signal : Large daily inflows indicate renewed allocation from wealth managers and advisors. Watch points : Sustained ETF inflows, exchange reserves, and Fed policy expectations will determine if the rally continues. Conclusion Bitcoin ETF inflows of roughly $3.24 billion in early October reflect a notable return of institutional demand, elevating BTC toward the $125,000 resistance. Analysts from JPMorgan, Standard Chartered, and Citigroup have revised targets higher, reinforcing a cautious but constructive outlook. Investors should monitor flows, on-chain metrics, and macro signals for confirmation before adjusting allocations. BTCUSD.title: Analyst: XRP Is on the Brink of Its Parabolic Run. Here‚Äôs the Timeline
BTCUSD.body: Markets have a way of testing conviction before rewarding it. For XRP holders, that moment of quiet before the storm feels closer than ever. After months of sideways consolidation and growing impatience, many analysts now believe XRP is positioning itself for a powerful move ‚Äî one that could redefine its market trajectory when it finally unfolds. The Setup: Pattern and Price Renowned market observer The Crypto Philosopher recently shared a striking technical comparison between XRP‚Äôs current structure and Amazon‚Äôs chart from the early 2000s. In the video, XRP‚Äôs weekly chart is overlaid with Amazon‚Äôs long-term base that preceded its historic 14x rally from $5 to $70. The resemblance, he argues, is no coincidence. A cup-and-handle pattern is emerging in XRP‚Äôs chart, a classic bullish setup that typically precedes a significant upward move. According to The Crypto Philosopher, XRP‚Äôs current support sits firmly around $2.70, with a critical breakout level near $3.02. A confirmed move above this resistance, especially with increasing trading volume, could ignite a parabolic run ‚Äî mirroring the way Amazon‚Äôs breakout unleashed years of compounding gains. Xrp is on the brink of its parabolic run It‚Äôll happen when you least expect it Just keep waiting pic.twitter.com/laTpiG5nzE ‚Äî The Crypto Philosopher (@TheCryptoP73649) October 2, 2025 The Amazon Analogy and Its Implications The comparison to Amazon is notable because it suggests XRP is following a similar pattern of accumulation before explosive growth. Just as Amazon built a foundation for years after the dot-com crash, XRP has been laying groundwork despite market doubts and regulatory challenges. While parallels between equities and digital assets should be drawn with caution, the core logic remains: strong fundamentals, persistent development, and an extended consolidation phase can set the stage for substantial upward revaluation. In XRP‚Äôs case, the alignment of technical structure, liquidity positioning, and renewed investor sentiment strengthens the bullish argument. The Expected Timeline If the pattern continues to unfold as projected, XRP could be entering the final stretch of its handle formation, a period that typically lasts from several days to a few weeks before a breakout confirmation. Analysts suggest that a decisive close above $3.02 would mark the official start of the next leg up. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 From there, momentum could accelerate rapidly, driven by institutional inflows, renewed market confidence, and increased adoption of Ripple‚Äôs technologies in real-world payments and tokenization. However, timing remains fluid. True parabolic runs rarely announce themselves in advance. As The Crypto Philosopher aptly noted, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôll happen when you least expect it.‚Äù Risks and Confirmation Signals Despite the bullish outlook, traders are urged to remain disciplined. False breakouts can occur, especially in a volatile market. To confirm the trend, analysts suggest looking for three key indicators: sustained volume growth, successful retests of new support levels, and overall crypto market strength driven by Bitcoin. In summary, XRP‚Äôs technical setup is nearing a crucial inflection point. If price and volume converge as anticipated, the conditions for a parabolic surge could soon align ‚Äî turning patience into payoff for long-term believers. Yet, as every seasoned trader knows, conviction must be matched with caution, because even the most promising charts demand validation before the real run begins. BTCUSD.title: Bitcoin ETFs recorded $3.24 billion in net inflows this week, marking the largest weekly inflow of 2025
BTCUSD.body: A recent surge in spot Bitcoin ETF inflows has pushed the price of Bitcoin closer to its last known all-time high as institutions start off October with intense buying ahead of what the general timeline is predicting will be an up only month. The increased Bitcoin ETF inflows, as the U.S. government remains shut down , have led analysts to note the diversion of funds into safe-haven alternatives like Bitcoin and gold, with the latter setting all-time high prices during the week. Bitcoin ETF inflows reach 2025 high According to data from SosoValue , Bitcoin ETFs attracted $3.24 billion in net inflows this week. It is their largest weekly inflow since the year began and is also their second-largest weekly haul since they launched last year. Bitcoin ETFs posted their strongest week in 2025 in the first week of the U.S. government‚Äôs shutdown. Source: SoSoValue The Bitcoin ETFs saw $3.24 billion in weekly inflows between Monday and Friday this week, with Friday‚Äôs net inflow of $985 million being the second-largest daily inflow, second only to the $987 million they poured in on January 6. This reversed the $902 million outflow from the previous week and pushed four-week inflows close to $4 billion. The record Bitcoin ETFs‚Äô weekly inflows are also happening alongside the rally in BTC‚Äôs price that kicked off the month. The price is already up over 10% this month, living up to the ‚ÄúUptober‚Äù hype based on the fact that October is BTC‚Äôs second-best-performing month based on historical data. Year-to-date, Bitcoin ETFs have drawn in $23 billion of the $58 billion in total net inflows since their inception, a factor analysts claim is proof of growing institutional adoption. Aside from the increased inflow, the market also seems to be pricing in another potential Fed rate cut. BTC shines as U.S. government shutdown continues The increased ETF inflows may have triggered another rally in BTC‚Äôs price; however, the U.S. government shutdown that began on October 1, 2025, may sustain the trend for the rest of the month. The political uncertainty that led to the government shutdown has also coincided with dollar price turbulence and talk of a capital flight as investors rush to hedge against the fall with BTC and precious metals. Observers are now predicting a month-long rally, including JPMorgan analysts, calling out the ‚Äúdebasement trades,‚Äù as investors continue to move to BTC and gold to hedge against inflation and macro uncertainties, including the ongoing U.S. government shutdown . Prediction marketplace Polymarket has suggested there is over a 60% chance that the shutdown will last 10‚Äì29 days, during which BTC will really have a chance to shine as a store of value and hedge against inflation. On Kalshi, the current forecast implies the stoppage will last 11.1 days, up sharply in recent days as there has been no progress in negotiations happening on Capitol Hill. The shutdown formally started early Wednesday morning following a deadlock between top Democrats and Republicans, including President Donald Trump, on a short-term deal to keep the government funded. Government shutdowns usually last about 14 days, based on data from Bank of America going back to 1990. The S&P 500 has averaged a 1% increase during these events, but a prolonged closure this time could affect the already fragile markets. Don‚Äôt just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

BTCUSD.title: Are These the 2 Best Cryptos to Buy as Trump-Backed Thumzup Media Expands Dogecoin Mining With $2.5M Investment?
BTCUSD.body: Thumzup Media, a Trump-backed company, has announced that it has invested $2.5 million in ramping up Dogecoin mining activities with hundreds of additional ASIC rigs and a significant boost in network hash power. The move has rekindled bullish interest in Dogecoin (DOGE), with some speculating that institutional entry may take its price beyond the $1 mark during the next bull run. That said, though DOGE‚Äôs momentum is worth keeping an eye on, more seasoned investors are now turning their attention to Mutuum Finance (MUTM) with much greater upside potential. Now at only $0.035, Mutuum Finance has already emerged as one of 2025‚Äôs most formidable DeFi plays thanks to its dual lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and non-custodial smart contract architecture. Presale Stage 6 is already over 55% sold, with more than 16,750 holders and more than $16.8 million raised, all of which are positive indicators of institutional and whale confidence. Mutuum Finance is the smart, utility-backed choice over meme-driven cryptocurrencies like DOGE. Thumzup Media‚Äôs $2.5M Investment Has the Potential to Be a Game-Changer for Dogecoin‚Äôs Future Dogecoin (DOGE) is winning back institutional confidence after Thumzup Media, a Trump family-supported business, made a substantial $2.5 million investment. The funding will enable DogeHash Technologies to expand its mining capacity exponentially, with over 4,000 mining rigs operational prior to year-end, one of the most extensive Dogecoin mining networks in the U.S. The addition of 500 new high-performance ASIC miners will expand the hash rate of the network, accelerating transaction speed, boosting security, and building further trust in the system as a whole. Thumzup‚Äôs entry, signaled by its recent acquisition of 19 BTC and 7.5 million DOGE and eventual investment of as much as $250 million in digital assets, is an indicator of growing institutional interest and confidence in Dogecoin‚Äôs long-term potential. Analysts predict the development to catalyze broader institutional uptake and boost DOGE‚Äôs position in mainstream crypto portfolios. But as Dogecoin fundamentals keep growing stronger, increasingly more investors are also investigating Mutuum Finance (MUTM), which could offer even greater upside potential beyond the meme-coin narrative. Mutuum Finance Presale Gains Traction Mutuum Finance is generating even more hype and anticipation for its presale, with the platform already raising over $16.8 million and having over 16,750 investors onboard to date. Stage 6 of the project is ongoing, during which MUTM tokens are available for purchase at $0.035 per token. In appreciation of early adopters, Mutuum Finance is hosting a $100,000 giveaway promotion, in which 10 users will be rewarded with $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens each. The protocol will have a dynamic floating interest rate mechanism that makes the most efficient use of liquidity. Low interest rate environments and excess liquidity environments encourage borrowing and ecosystem activity and high demand environments and higher interest rates encourage loan repayment and incoming capital flows. Fixed interest models function optimally when liquidity is constant, adjusting organically to overall market forces. Mutuum Finance Advances Development of Lending & Borrowing Protocol Mutuum Finance is going ahead with the development of its lending and borrowing protocol , a key step to enhancing its decentralized finance ecosystem. The first version (V1) of the protocol is expected on Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025 and will include functionalities such as a liquidity pool, mtToken, debt token, liquidator bot, and more. ETH and USDT will be supported for lending, borrowing, and collateral at the time of launch, providing users with a convenient and secure DeFi experience. Lending, borrowing, and liquidation at a profit require efficient asset valuation. To this effect, Mutuum Finance uses Chainlink oracles to retrieve live USD and principal crypto asset prices such as ETH, MATIC, and AVAX. The platform realizes optimum data accuracy by utilizing fallback oracle systems, composite data feeds, and time-weighted averages from decentralized exchanges for quality valuations during the highly volatile and distressed market conditions. Dogecoin (DOGE) or Mutuum Finance (MUTM)? Dogecoin‚Äôs $2.5M mining incentive shows growing interest, but Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a far more promising prospect. At $0.035 and with over 55% sold, 16,750+ buyers and $16.8M invested, MUTM‚Äôs twin lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and upcoming DeFi protocol render it a utility-based altcoin with tremendous growth potential, which makes DOGE seem like a less desirable option for serious investors. ETHUSD.title: Altcoins with the Highest Number of Transactions in the Last Week Revealed ‚Äì Here‚Äôs the List
ETHUSD.body: The networks that saw the most transactions in the cryptocurrency market over the past week have been announced. According to the data, Solana (SOL) maintained its leadership with over 386 million transactions, while the Plasma (XPL) network attracted attention with its record increase in transaction volume. Here are the most traded altcoin networks and their transaction change rates in the last seven days: Solana (SOL) ‚Äî 386,578,256 trades (-7.9%) BNB Chain (BNB) ‚Äî 100,659,384 transactions (-5.3%) Base ‚Äî 70,203,899 transactions (-15%) Tron (TRX) ‚Äî 65,631,069 trades (+2.2%) Somnia ‚Äî 45,495,813 transactions (-37%) Aptos (APT) ‚Äî 40,384,819 trades (+12%) Near Protocol (NEAR) ‚Äî 35,867,760 transactions (+15%) Plasma ‚Äî 26,876,528 transactions (+7,942%) Polygon (MATIC) ‚Äî 24,593,148 transactions (+0.8%) Stellar (XLM) ‚Äî 23,052,371 transactions (+15%) Related News: For The First Time, a Spot ETF Application Has Been Filed for This Altcoin According to the data, Plasma was the most notable network of the week, with a 7,942% increase in transaction volume. Solana and BNB Chain, despite small declines, were among the most heavily used networks in the market in terms of transaction volume. ETHUSD.title: Big Move: Ethereum Foundation Trades $4.5M ETH For Stable Assets
ETHUSD.body: Ethereum‚Äôs steward moved part of its crypto coffers this week, converting a chunk of ETH into stablecoins as it adjusts how it funds projects and grants. Foundation Moves To Stablecoin Holdings According to reports, the Ethereum Foundation converted 1,000 ETH into stablecoins using the decentralized trading router CoW Swap, a transaction worth about $4.5 million at the time. The move was executed as part of the foundation‚Äôs ongoing treasury actions and was presented as a step to secure more predictable funds for research, grants, and donations. The specific stablecoin or coins received in exchange were not publicly named in initial reports. The Foundation‚Äôs treasurer has been managing a broader plan. Reports have disclosed a previously stated intention to convert up to 10,000 Ether over a period of weeks, and this latest trade appears to be an element of that phased approach rather than a one-off sale. Holding stable assets gives the foundation a clearer view of its short-term spending power while it evaluates longer-term strategy. 1/ Today, The Ethereum Foundation will convert 1000 ETH to stablecoins via @CoWSwap ‚Äòs TWAP feature, as part of our ongoing work to fund R&D, grants and donations, and to highlight the power of DeFi. ‚Äî Ethereum Foundation (@ethereumfndn) October 3, 2025 Use Of Decentralized Trading Tools The choice to use CoW Swap ‚Äî a decentralized aggregator that aims to reduce slippage and market impact ‚Äî was highlighted in public coverage. By routing the trade through decentralized infrastructure instead of a single centralized exchange, the Foundation reduced some counterparty and custody concerns. The execution method was described as careful and aimed at protecting the value of the sale during the swap. Alongside the transaction, internal operational decisions have also been articulated. The Foundation indicated it temporarily applied the breaks on open submissions of a grant for its Ecosystem Support Program in order to give attention to the large influx of proposals and prioritize urgent or high-impact work. Changes in leadership and institutional reorganization, have also been discussed publicly as part of recent organizational action, portrayed in a manner that suggests a transition is underway internally to accompany any change in the direction of treasury management as well. What Comes Next For The Treasury Market watchers noted that converting ETH to stablecoins is a common liquidity-management tactic. Volatility in ETH‚Äôs price can make budgeting for multi-month support programs difficult; stable assets can smooth out planning. While some community members saw the sale as a reduction of ETH holdings, others pointed out that the foundation‚Äôs core mission ‚Äî to support Ethereum‚Äôs development ‚Äî remains unchanged. ETHUSD.title: Arbitrum price prediction 2025 ‚Äì 2031: Will ARB recapture $2?
ETHUSD.body: Key takeaways: Our ARB predictions anticipate a high of $0.82 in 2025. In 2027, it will range between $1.01 and $1.22, with an average price of $1.04. In 2030, it will range between $2.98 and $3.51, with an average price of $3.08. Layer 2s have made quite a buzz over the last few months because of their high network activity. Arbitrum led the Layer 2 pack with a total value locked ( TVL ) of $2.53 billion. Arbitrum is an Optimistic Rollup solution that shifts network operations away from the Ethereum mainnet while maintaining Ethereum-level security. Arbitrum‚Äôs BOLD testnet also went live; when integrated into the mainnet, the update will enable permissionless validation on Arbitrum. This means that anyone can challenge the state of the Arbitrum network. Currently, validators are allow-listed. Is Arbitrum a good investment? Will it go up? Where will it be in 5 years? Let‚Äôs answer these questions and more in our Arbitrum price prediction. Looking back, ARB had a steep decline in April, which saw it register its lowest price since launch at $0.245. It has since recovered the losses. The charts‚Äô short candles are indicative of a bear market. The MACD histograms show its negative momentum rose over the last 16 hours. ARB‚Äôs dip reflects natural profit-taking after a strong quarter and shifting focus toward competing L2 developments. Fixed interest models function optimally when liquidity is constant, adjusting organically to overall market forces. Dogecoin (DOGE) or Mutuum Finance (MUTM)? Dogecoin‚Äôs $2.5M mining incentive shows growing interest, but Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a far more promising prospect. SOLUSD.title: U.S. tech giants reached $20.8 trillion market cap, surpassing the EU‚Äôs $19.4 trillion GDP milestone
SOLUSD.body: The Magnificent 7 collectively reached a combined market capitalization of $20.8 trillion, surpassing the EU‚Äôs GDP of $19.4 trillion. The GDP of the European Union stood at USD 19.42 trillion in 2024 and was expected to increase slightly to over USD 19.65 trillion in 2025. The European Commission revealed that the spring forecast projected real GDP growth in 2025 at 1.1% in the EU and 0.9% in the euro area, broadly the same rates attained in 2024 Magnificent 7 dominate global markets Nvidia reported a market valuation of $4.3 trillion, $165.2 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, and $115.4 billion in gross profit. Microsoft reported a market valuation of $3.85 trillion. In the fourth quarter of FY2025, Microsoft‚Äôs sales totalled $76.4 billion, representing an 18% increase over the previous year. Net income increased 24% to $27.2 billion, while operating income increased 23% to $34.3 billion. At $3.65, diluted earnings per share represented a 24% increase over the previous year. As of October 2, Apple had a market value of $3.78 trillion, bolstered by $190.7 billion in gross profit and $408.6 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, which yielded an annualized return of 17.52% over the past five years. Google‚Äôs Alphabet had a market valuation of $2.95 trillion, $371.4 billion in revenue, and $218.9 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 27.07%. Amazon had a market valuation of $2.34 trillion, $670.0 billion in revenue, and $332.4 billion in gross profit. Amazon has a 6.39% five-year return. Meta also reported a market valuation of $1.84 trillion, $178.8 billion in revenue, and $146.5 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 22.61%. As of October 2, Tesla‚Äôs market value stood at $1.48 trillion, bolstered by $16.2 billion in gross profit and $92.7 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, with a five-year annualized return of 24.38%. Global leaders warn as tech giants drive valuations beyond fundamentals üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ Over 50% of the US market cap is now pure Tech. Defensives have collapsed to under 15%. This isn‚Äôt diversification ‚Äì it‚Äôs a Tech Empire üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ $tsla $nvda $google $appl #Bitcoin $qqq pic.twitter.com/taa4SxxSME ‚Äî Hod | Code2Capital (@HodTzdaka) October 3, 2025 David Solomon, CEO of Goldman Sachs, warned on Friday at Italian Tech Week in Turin, that an AI investment frenzy may be overdone and that stock markets are due for a ‚Äúdrawdown.‚Äù Solomon said major US stock indexes have notched record high after record high this year on the promise of artificial intelligence. He argued that there‚Äôs a good chance that not all of those investments will deliver big returns. He noted that the internet craze of the late 1990s and early 2000s drew a frenzy of investment in tech companies at the time. Solomon reminded the crowd that the internet craze was followed by a dramatic collapse, which is commonly known as the ‚Äúdot-com bubble‚Äù. ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if in the next 12 to 24 months, we see a drawdown with respect to equity markets.‚Äù David Solomon , Goldman Sachs CEO Jeff Bezos referred to the AI investment wave as an ‚Äúindustrial bubble.‚Äù He also emphasized that innovation stemming from such AI investment cycles can still yield long-term advantages. According to Bezos, the market is seeking the next big breakthrough, reminiscent of the dynamics of previous bubbles. He added that the previous bubble dynamic is why many small AI ventures with weak foundations receive investment. On October 3, Dario Perkins, TS Lombard‚Äôs Managing Director of Global Macro Research, raised an alarm when he noticed that big tech companies were increasingly using off-balance-sheet loans and special purpose entities (SPVs) to finance AI equipment. According to Perkins, this is a ‚Äúrecognition that this is getting out of hand.‚Äù Perkins emphasized that the real leverage and risk exposure of businesses like Meta, which has requested $29 billion in private finance for the expansion of its AI data centre, are concealed by such borrowing techniques. Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

SOLUSD.title: Analyst: XRP Is on the Brink of Its Parabolic Run. Here‚Äôs the Timeline
SOLUSD.body: Markets have a way of testing conviction before rewarding it. For XRP holders, that moment of quiet before the storm feels closer than ever. After months of sideways consolidation and growing impatience, many analysts now believe XRP is positioning itself for a powerful move ‚Äî one that could redefine its market trajectory when it finally unfolds. The Setup: Pattern and Price Renowned market observer The Crypto Philosopher recently shared a striking technical comparison between XRP‚Äôs current structure and Amazon‚Äôs chart from the early 2000s. In the video, XRP‚Äôs weekly chart is overlaid with Amazon‚Äôs long-term base that preceded its historic 14x rally from $5 to $70. The resemblance, he argues, is no coincidence. A cup-and-handle pattern is emerging in XRP‚Äôs chart, a classic bullish setup that typically precedes a significant upward move. According to The Crypto Philosopher, XRP‚Äôs current support sits firmly around $2.70, with a critical breakout level near $3.02. A confirmed move above this resistance, especially with increasing trading volume, could ignite a parabolic run ‚Äî mirroring the way Amazon‚Äôs breakout unleashed years of compounding gains. Xrp is on the brink of its parabolic run It‚Äôll happen when you least expect it Just keep waiting pic.twitter.com/laTpiG5nzE ‚Äî The Crypto Philosopher (@TheCryptoP73649) October 2, 2025 The Amazon Analogy and Its Implications The comparison to Amazon is notable because it suggests XRP is following a similar pattern of accumulation before explosive growth. Just as Amazon built a foundation for years after the dot-com crash, XRP has been laying groundwork despite market doubts and regulatory challenges. While parallels between equities and digital assets should be drawn with caution, the core logic remains: strong fundamentals, persistent development, and an extended consolidation phase can set the stage for substantial upward revaluation. In XRP‚Äôs case, the alignment of technical structure, liquidity positioning, and renewed investor sentiment strengthens the bullish argument. The Expected Timeline If the pattern continues to unfold as projected, XRP could be entering the final stretch of its handle formation, a period that typically lasts from several days to a few weeks before a breakout confirmation. Analysts suggest that a decisive close above $3.02 would mark the official start of the next leg up. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 From there, momentum could accelerate rapidly, driven by institutional inflows, renewed market confidence, and increased adoption of Ripple‚Äôs technologies in real-world payments and tokenization. However, timing remains fluid. True parabolic runs rarely announce themselves in advance. As The Crypto Philosopher aptly noted, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôll happen when you least expect it.‚Äù Risks and Confirmation Signals Despite the bullish outlook, traders are urged to remain disciplined. False breakouts can occur, especially in a volatile market. To confirm the trend, analysts suggest looking for three key indicators: sustained volume growth, successful retests of new support levels, and overall crypto market strength driven by Bitcoin. In summary, XRP‚Äôs technical setup is nearing a crucial inflection point. If price and volume converge as anticipated, the conditions for a parabolic surge could soon align ‚Äî turning patience into payoff for long-term believers. Yet, as every seasoned trader knows, conviction must be matched with caution, because even the most promising charts demand validation before the real run begins. SOLUSD.title: Are These the 2 Best Cryptos to Buy as Trump-Backed Thumzup Media Expands Dogecoin Mining With $2.5M Investment?
SOLUSD.body: Thumzup Media, a Trump-backed company, has announced that it has invested $2.5 million in ramping up Dogecoin mining activities with hundreds of additional ASIC rigs and a significant boost in network hash power. The move has rekindled bullish interest in Dogecoin (DOGE), with some speculating that institutional entry may take its price beyond the $1 mark during the next bull run. That said, though DOGE‚Äôs momentum is worth keeping an eye on, more seasoned investors are now turning their attention to Mutuum Finance (MUTM) with much greater upside potential. Now at only $0.035, Mutuum Finance has already emerged as one of 2025‚Äôs most formidable DeFi plays thanks to its dual lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and non-custodial smart contract architecture. Presale Stage 6 is already over 55% sold, with more than 16,750 holders and more than $16.8 million raised, all of which are positive indicators of institutional and whale confidence. Mutuum Finance is the smart, utility-backed choice over meme-driven cryptocurrencies like DOGE. Thumzup Media‚Äôs $2.5M Investment Has the Potential to Be a Game-Changer for Dogecoin‚Äôs Future Dogecoin (DOGE) is winning back institutional confidence after Thumzup Media, a Trump family-supported business, made a substantial $2.5 million investment. The funding will enable DogeHash Technologies to expand its mining capacity exponentially, with over 4,000 mining rigs operational prior to year-end, one of the most extensive Dogecoin mining networks in the U.S. The addition of 500 new high-performance ASIC miners will expand the hash rate of the network, accelerating transaction speed, boosting security, and building further trust in the system as a whole. Thumzup‚Äôs entry, signaled by its recent acquisition of 19 BTC and 7.5 million DOGE and eventual investment of as much as $250 million in digital assets, is an indicator of growing institutional interest and confidence in Dogecoin‚Äôs long-term potential. Analysts predict the development to catalyze broader institutional uptake and boost DOGE‚Äôs position in mainstream crypto portfolios. But as Dogecoin fundamentals keep growing stronger, increasingly more investors are also investigating Mutuum Finance (MUTM), which could offer even greater upside potential beyond the meme-coin narrative. Mutuum Finance Presale Gains Traction Mutuum Finance is generating even more hype and anticipation for its presale, with the platform already raising over $16.8 million and having over 16,750 investors onboard to date. Stage 6 of the project is ongoing, during which MUTM tokens are available for purchase at $0.035 per token. In appreciation of early adopters, Mutuum Finance is hosting a $100,000 giveaway promotion, in which 10 users will be rewarded with $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens each. The protocol will have a dynamic floating interest rate mechanism that makes the most efficient use of liquidity. Low interest rate environments and excess liquidity environments encourage borrowing and ecosystem activity and high demand environments and higher interest rates encourage loan repayment and incoming capital flows. Fixed interest models function optimally when liquidity is constant, adjusting organically to overall market forces. Mutuum Finance Advances Development of Lending & Borrowing Protocol Mutuum Finance is going ahead with the development of its lending and borrowing protocol , a key step to enhancing its decentralized finance ecosystem. The first version (V1) of the protocol is expected on Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025 and will include functionalities such as a liquidity pool, mtToken, debt token, liquidator bot, and more. ETH and USDT will be supported for lending, borrowing, and collateral at the time of launch, providing users with a convenient and secure DeFi experience. Lending, borrowing, and liquidation at a profit require efficient asset valuation. To this effect, Mutuum Finance uses Chainlink oracles to retrieve live USD and principal crypto asset prices such as ETH, MATIC, and AVAX. The platform realizes optimum data accuracy by utilizing fallback oracle systems, composite data feeds, and time-weighted averages from decentralized exchanges for quality valuations during the highly volatile and distressed market conditions. Dogecoin (DOGE) or Mutuum Finance (MUTM)? Dogecoin‚Äôs $2.5M mining incentive shows growing interest, but Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a far more promising prospect. At $0.035 and with over 55% sold, 16,750+ buyers and $16.8M invested, MUTM‚Äôs twin lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and upcoming DeFi protocol render it a utility-based altcoin with tremendous growth potential, which makes DOGE seem like a less desirable option for serious investors. For more information regarding Mutuum Finance (MUTM) please use the following links: Website: https://mutuum.com/ Linktree: https://linktr.ee/mutuumfinance

DOGEUSD.title: Eric Trump: I Know Brad Garlinghouse and XRP Very Well
DOGEUSD.body: A single podcast moment has sent ripples through both the political and crypto worlds. During a recent appearance on the PBD Podcast, Eric Trump made striking comments about his familiarity with Ripple, XRP, and its CEO, Brad Garlinghouse. The clip, shared by popular crypto influencer JackTheRippler on X, quickly gained momentum ‚Äî fueling widespread discussion about the growing intersection between politics and digital finance. The conversation took place during the October 4, 2025, episode of the PBD Podcast, hosted by entrepreneur Patrick Bet-David. When asked how he felt about Dogecoin, XRP, Ripple, and Ethereum, Eric Trump‚Äôs candid response caught the attention of the crypto community. ‚ÄúI know them all extremely well. I know Brad very well, and XRP, he‚Äôs done a great job,‚Äù Trump said. JackTheRippler‚Äôs post featuring the clip has since gone viral, with thousands of reposts and comments from the XRP community. Many enthusiasts see Trump‚Äôs acknowledgment of Garlinghouse as a symbolic nod to Ripple‚Äôs growing relevance in global finance ‚Äî especially as the company continues to recover from years of legal scrutiny and reposition itself for mainstream adoption. Eric Trump says that he knows Brad Garlinghouse and #XRP very well! pic.twitter.com/EK4bygBRLh ‚Äî JackTheRippler ¬© (@RippleXrpie) October 4, 2025 A Notable Moment for Ripple and XRP Ripple‚Äôs reputation has strengthened considerably in 2025 following the conclusion of its legal dispute with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Ripple has focused on scaling its payment infrastructure and expanding the reach of RLUSD. In this context, Eric Trump‚Äôs praise for Brad Garlinghouse carries additional weight. His words come at a time when institutional interest in blockchain payment systems is accelerating ‚Äî and when the U.S. political landscape is increasingly open to discussing crypto innovation within regulated frameworks. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Bridging Politics and Crypto Innovation Eric Trump‚Äôs remarks also highlight a broader trend: the mainstreaming of cryptocurrency within political and economic circles. His characterization of Bitcoin as ‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù and Ethereum as ‚Äúfinancial oil‚Äù reflects an informed understanding of their roles within the digital economy. Yet, it was his personal acknowledgment of Brad Garlinghouse and XRP that truly resonated with investors, given Ripple‚Äôs established presence in institutional payment settlements. The moment signifies how figures within political leadership are beginning to publicly recognize the companies driving blockchain utility, not just speculative assets. In conclusion, while Eric Trump did not make any investment claims about XRP, his recognition of Brad Garlinghouse and Ripple stands as a noteworthy endorsement from a prominent political figure. The viral clip shared by JackTheRippler underscores how quickly influence, politics, and crypto narratives can converge ‚Äî sometimes in just a few seconds of conversation. For Ripple and its supporters, those few words from the president‚Äôs son may have done more than spark social-media buzz; they reaffirmed that XRP‚Äôs name is now part of the mainstream financial dialogue. DOTUSD.title: U.S. tech giants reached $20.8 trillion market cap, surpassing the EU‚Äôs $19.4 trillion GDP milestone
DOTUSD.body: The Magnificent 7 collectively reached a combined market capitalization of $20.8 trillion, surpassing the EU‚Äôs GDP of $19.4 trillion. The GDP of the European Union stood at USD 19.42 trillion in 2024 and was expected to increase slightly to over USD 19.65 trillion in 2025. The European Commission revealed that the spring forecast projected real GDP growth in 2025 at 1.1% in the EU and 0.9% in the euro area, broadly the same rates attained in 2024 Magnificent 7 dominate global markets Nvidia reported a market valuation of $4.3 trillion, $165.2 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, and $115.4 billion in gross profit. Microsoft reported a market valuation of $3.85 trillion. In the fourth quarter of FY2025, Microsoft‚Äôs sales totalled $76.4 billion, representing an 18% increase over the previous year. Net income increased 24% to $27.2 billion, while operating income increased 23% to $34.3 billion. At $3.65, diluted earnings per share represented a 24% increase over the previous year. As of October 2, Apple had a market value of $3.78 trillion, bolstered by $190.7 billion in gross profit and $408.6 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, which yielded an annualized return of 17.52% over the past five years. Google‚Äôs Alphabet had a market valuation of $2.95 trillion, $371.4 billion in revenue, and $218.9 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 27.07%. Amazon had a market valuation of $2.34 trillion, $670.0 billion in revenue, and $332.4 billion in gross profit. Amazon has a 6.39% five-year return. Meta also reported a market valuation of $1.84 trillion, $178.8 billion in revenue, and $146.5 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 22.61%. As of October 2, Tesla‚Äôs market value stood at $1.48 trillion, bolstered by $16.2 billion in gross profit and $92.7 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, with a five-year annualized return of 24.38%. Global leaders warn as tech giants drive valuations beyond fundamentals üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ Over 50% of the US market cap is now pure Tech. Defensives have collapsed to under 15%. This isn‚Äôt diversification ‚Äì it‚Äôs a Tech Empire üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ $tsla $nvda $google $appl #Bitcoin $qqq pic.twitter.com/taa4SxxSME ‚Äî Hod | Code2Capital (@HodTzdaka) October 3, 2025 David Solomon, CEO of Goldman Sachs, warned on Friday at Italian Tech Week in Turin, that an AI investment frenzy may be overdone and that stock markets are due for a ‚Äúdrawdown.‚Äù Solomon said major US stock indexes have notched record high after record high this year on the promise of artificial intelligence. He argued that there‚Äôs a good chance that not all of those investments will deliver big returns. He noted that the internet craze of the late 1990s and early 2000s drew a frenzy of investment in tech companies at the time. Solomon reminded the crowd that the internet craze was followed by a dramatic collapse, which is commonly known as the ‚Äúdot-com bubble‚Äù. ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if in the next 12 to 24 months, we see a drawdown with respect to equity markets.‚Äù David Solomon , Goldman Sachs CEO Jeff Bezos referred to the AI investment wave as an ‚Äúindustrial bubble.‚Äù He also emphasized that innovation stemming from such AI investment cycles can still yield long-term advantages. According to Bezos, the market is seeking the next big breakthrough, reminiscent of the dynamics of previous bubbles. He added that the previous bubble dynamic is why many small AI ventures with weak foundations receive investment. On October 3, Dario Perkins, TS Lombard‚Äôs Managing Director of Global Macro Research, raised an alarm when he noticed that big tech companies were increasingly using off-balance-sheet loans and special purpose entities (SPVs) to finance AI equipment. According to Perkins, this is a ‚Äúrecognition that this is getting out of hand.‚Äù Perkins emphasized that the real leverage and risk exposure of businesses like Meta, which has requested $29 billion in private finance for the expansion of its AI data centre, are concealed by such borrowing techniques. DOTUSD.title: Analyst: XRP Is on the Brink of Its Parabolic Run. Here‚Äôs the Timeline
DOTUSD.body: Markets have a way of testing conviction before rewarding it. For XRP holders, that moment of quiet before the storm feels closer than ever. After months of sideways consolidation and growing impatience, many analysts now believe XRP is positioning itself for a powerful move ‚Äî one that could redefine its market trajectory when it finally unfolds. The Setup: Pattern and Price Renowned market observer The Crypto Philosopher recently shared a striking technical comparison between XRP‚Äôs current structure and Amazon‚Äôs chart from the early 2000s. In the video, XRP‚Äôs weekly chart is overlaid with Amazon‚Äôs long-term base that preceded its historic 14x rally from $5 to $70. The resemblance, he argues, is no coincidence. A cup-and-handle pattern is emerging in XRP‚Äôs chart, a classic bullish setup that typically precedes a significant upward move. According to The Crypto Philosopher, XRP‚Äôs current support sits firmly around $2.70, with a critical breakout level near $3.02. A confirmed move above this resistance, especially with increasing trading volume, could ignite a parabolic run ‚Äî mirroring the way Amazon‚Äôs breakout unleashed years of compounding gains. Xrp is on the brink of its parabolic run It‚Äôll happen when you least expect it Just keep waiting pic.twitter.com/laTpiG5nzE ‚Äî The Crypto Philosopher (@TheCryptoP73649) October 2, 2025 The Amazon Analogy and Its Implications The comparison to Amazon is notable because it suggests XRP is following a similar pattern of accumulation before explosive growth. Just as Amazon built a foundation for years after the dot-com crash, XRP has been laying groundwork despite market doubts and regulatory challenges. While parallels between equities and digital assets should be drawn with caution, the core logic remains: strong fundamentals, persistent development, and an extended consolidation phase can set the stage for substantial upward revaluation. In XRP‚Äôs case, the alignment of technical structure, liquidity positioning, and renewed investor sentiment strengthens the bullish argument. The Expected Timeline If the pattern continues to unfold as projected, XRP could be entering the final stretch of its handle formation, a period that typically lasts from several days to a few weeks before a breakout confirmation. Analysts suggest that a decisive close above $3.02 would mark the official start of the next leg up. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 From there, momentum could accelerate rapidly, driven by institutional inflows, renewed market confidence, and increased adoption of Ripple‚Äôs technologies in real-world payments and tokenization. However, timing remains fluid. True parabolic runs rarely announce themselves in advance. As The Crypto Philosopher aptly noted, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôll happen when you least expect it.‚Äù Risks and Confirmation Signals Despite the bullish outlook, traders are urged to remain disciplined. False breakouts can occur, especially in a volatile market. To confirm the trend, analysts suggest looking for three key indicators: sustained volume growth, successful retests of new support levels, and overall crypto market strength driven by Bitcoin. In summary, XRP‚Äôs technical setup is nearing a crucial inflection point. If price and volume converge as anticipated, the conditions for a parabolic surge could soon align ‚Äî turning patience into payoff for long-term believers. Yet, as every seasoned trader knows, conviction must be matched with caution, because even the most promising charts demand validation before the real run begins. MATICUSD.title: Altcoins with the Highest Number of Transactions in the Last Week Revealed ‚Äì Here‚Äôs the List
MATICUSD.body: The networks that saw the most transactions in the cryptocurrency market over the past week have been announced. According to the data, Solana (SOL) maintained its leadership with over 386 million transactions, while the Plasma (XPL) network attracted attention with its record increase in transaction volume. Here are the most traded altcoin networks and their transaction change rates in the last seven days: Solana (SOL) ‚Äî 386,578,256 trades (-7.9%) BNB Chain (BNB) ‚Äî 100,659,384 transactions (-5.3%) Base ‚Äî 70,203,899 transactions (-15%) Tron (TRX) ‚Äî 65,631,069 trades (+2.2%) Somnia ‚Äî 45,495,813 transactions (-37%) Aptos (APT) ‚Äî 40,384,819 trades (+12%) Near Protocol (NEAR) ‚Äî 35,867,760 transactions (+15%) Plasma ‚Äî 26,876,528 transactions (+7,942%) Polygon (MATIC) ‚Äî 24,593,148 transactions (+0.8%) Stellar (XLM) ‚Äî 23,052,371 transactions (+15%) Related News: For The First Time, a Spot ETF Application Has Been Filed for This Altcoin According to the data, Plasma was the most notable network of the week, with a 7,942% increase in transaction volume. Solana and BNB Chain, despite small declines, were among the most heavily used networks in the market in terms of transaction volume. Tron generated the most transaction fees with $9.09 million, followed by Ethereum and BNB Chain. The volume of memecoins was particularly influential in the Solana network reaching such a high transaction number. *This is not investment advice. MATICUSD.title: Are These the 2 Best Cryptos to Buy as Trump-Backed Thumzup Media Expands Dogecoin Mining With $2.5M Investment?
MATICUSD.body: Thumzup Media, a Trump-backed company, has announced that it has invested $2.5 million in ramping up Dogecoin mining activities with hundreds of additional ASIC rigs and a significant boost in network hash power. The move has rekindled bullish interest in Dogecoin (DOGE), with some speculating that institutional entry may take its price beyond the $1 mark during the next bull run. That said, though DOGE‚Äôs momentum is worth keeping an eye on, more seasoned investors are now turning their attention to Mutuum Finance (MUTM) with much greater upside potential. Now at only $0.035, Mutuum Finance has already emerged as one of 2025‚Äôs most formidable DeFi plays thanks to its dual lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and non-custodial smart contract architecture. Presale Stage 6 is already over 55% sold, with more than 16,750 holders and more than $16.8 million raised, all of which are positive indicators of institutional and whale confidence. Mutuum Finance is the smart, utility-backed choice over meme-driven cryptocurrencies like DOGE. Thumzup Media‚Äôs $2.5M Investment Has the Potential to Be a Game-Changer for Dogecoin‚Äôs Future Dogecoin (DOGE) is winning back institutional confidence after Thumzup Media, a Trump family-supported business, made a substantial $2.5 million investment. The funding will enable DogeHash Technologies to expand its mining capacity exponentially, with over 4,000 mining rigs operational prior to year-end, one of the most extensive Dogecoin mining networks in the U.S. The addition of 500 new high-performance ASIC miners will expand the hash rate of the network, accelerating transaction speed, boosting security, and building further trust in the system as a whole. Thumzup‚Äôs entry, signaled by its recent acquisition of 19 BTC and 7.5 million DOGE and eventual investment of as much as $250 million in digital assets, is an indicator of growing institutional interest and confidence in Dogecoin‚Äôs long-term potential. Analysts predict the development to catalyze broader institutional uptake and boost DOGE‚Äôs position in mainstream crypto portfolios. But as Dogecoin fundamentals keep growing stronger, increasingly more investors are also investigating Mutuum Finance (MUTM), which could offer even greater upside potential beyond the meme-coin narrative. Mutuum Finance Presale Gains Traction Mutuum Finance is generating even more hype and anticipation for its presale, with the platform already raising over $16.8 million and having over 16,750 investors onboard to date. Stage 6 of the project is ongoing, during which MUTM tokens are available for purchase at $0.035 per token. In appreciation of early adopters, Mutuum Finance is hosting a $100,000 giveaway promotion, in which 10 users will be rewarded with $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens each. The protocol will have a dynamic floating interest rate mechanism that makes the most efficient use of liquidity. Low interest rate environments and excess liquidity environments encourage borrowing and ecosystem activity and high demand environments and higher interest rates encourage loan repayment and incoming capital flows. Fixed interest models function optimally when liquidity is constant, adjusting organically to overall market forces. Mutuum Finance Advances Development of Lending & Borrowing Protocol Mutuum Finance is going ahead with the development of its lending and borrowing protocol , a key step to enhancing its decentralized finance ecosystem. The first version (V1) of the protocol is expected on Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025 and will include functionalities such as a liquidity pool, mtToken, debt token, liquidator bot, and more. ETH and USDT will be supported for lending, borrowing, and collateral at the time of launch, providing users with a convenient and secure DeFi experience. Lending, borrowing, and liquidation at a profit require efficient asset valuation. To this effect, Mutuum Finance uses Chainlink oracles to retrieve live USD and principal crypto asset prices such as ETH, MATIC, and AVAX. The platform realizes optimum data accuracy by utilizing fallback oracle systems, composite data feeds, and time-weighted averages from decentralized exchanges for quality valuations during the highly volatile and distressed market conditions. Dogecoin (DOGE) or Mutuum Finance (MUTM)? Dogecoin‚Äôs $2.5M mining incentive shows growing interest, but Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a far more promising prospect. At $0.035 and with over 55% sold, 16,750+ buyers and $16.8M invested, MUTM‚Äôs twin lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and upcoming DeFi protocol render it a utility-based altcoin with tremendous growth potential, which makes DOGE seem like a less desirable option for serious investors. For more information regarding Mutuum Finance (MUTM) please use the following links: Website: https://mutuum.com/ Linktree: https://linktr.ee/mutuumfinance

Immediate hedge against inflation: Bitcoin is often used as a store-of-value alternative to cash. UNIUSD.title: Big Move: Ethereum Foundation Trades $4.5M ETH For Stable Assets
UNIUSD.body: Ethereum‚Äôs steward moved part of its crypto coffers this week, converting a chunk of ETH into stablecoins as it adjusts how it funds projects and grants. Foundation Moves To Stablecoin Holdings According to reports, the Ethereum Foundation converted 1,000 ETH into stablecoins using the decentralized trading router CoW Swap, a transaction worth about $4.5 million at the time. The move was executed as part of the foundation‚Äôs ongoing treasury actions and was presented as a step to secure more predictable funds for research, grants, and donations. The specific stablecoin or coins received in exchange were not publicly named in initial reports. The Foundation‚Äôs treasurer has been managing a broader plan. Reports have disclosed a previously stated intention to convert up to 10,000 Ether over a period of weeks, and this latest trade appears to be an element of that phased approach rather than a one-off sale. Holding stable assets gives the foundation a clearer view of its short-term spending power while it evaluates longer-term strategy. 1/ Today, The Ethereum Foundation will convert 1000 ETH to stablecoins via @CoWSwap ‚Äòs TWAP feature, as part of our ongoing work to fund R&D, grants and donations, and to highlight the power of DeFi. ‚Äî Ethereum Foundation (@ethereumfndn) October 3, 2025 Use Of Decentralized Trading Tools The choice to use CoW Swap ‚Äî a decentralized aggregator that aims to reduce slippage and market impact ‚Äî was highlighted in public coverage. By routing the trade through decentralized infrastructure instead of a single centralized exchange, the Foundation reduced some counterparty and custody concerns. The execution method was described as careful and aimed at protecting the value of the sale during the swap. Alongside the transaction, internal operational decisions have also been articulated. The Foundation indicated it temporarily applied the breaks on open submissions of a grant for its Ecosystem Support Program in order to give attention to the large influx of proposals and prioritize urgent or high-impact work. Changes in leadership and institutional reorganization, have also been discussed publicly as part of recent organizational action, portrayed in a manner that suggests a transition is underway internally to accompany any change in the direction of treasury management as well. What Comes Next For The Treasury Market watchers noted that converting ETH to stablecoins is a common liquidity-management tactic. Volatility in ETH‚Äôs price can make budgeting for multi-month support programs difficult; stable assets can smooth out planning. UNIUSD.title: U.S. tech giants reached $20.8 trillion market cap, surpassing the EU‚Äôs $19.4 trillion GDP milestone
UNIUSD.body: The Magnificent 7 collectively reached a combined market capitalization of $20.8 trillion, surpassing the EU‚Äôs GDP of $19.4 trillion. The GDP of the European Union stood at USD 19.42 trillion in 2024 and was expected to increase slightly to over USD 19.65 trillion in 2025. The European Commission revealed that the spring forecast projected real GDP growth in 2025 at 1.1% in the EU and 0.9% in the euro area, broadly the same rates attained in 2024 Magnificent 7 dominate global markets Nvidia reported a market valuation of $4.3 trillion, $165.2 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, and $115.4 billion in gross profit. Microsoft reported a market valuation of $3.85 trillion. In the fourth quarter of FY2025, Microsoft‚Äôs sales totalled $76.4 billion, representing an 18% increase over the previous year. Net income increased 24% to $27.2 billion, while operating income increased 23% to $34.3 billion. At $3.65, diluted earnings per share represented a 24% increase over the previous year. As of October 2, Apple had a market value of $3.78 trillion, bolstered by $190.7 billion in gross profit and $408.6 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, which yielded an annualized return of 17.52% over the past five years. Google‚Äôs Alphabet had a market valuation of $2.95 trillion, $371.4 billion in revenue, and $218.9 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 27.07%. Amazon had a market valuation of $2.34 trillion, $670.0 billion in revenue, and $332.4 billion in gross profit. Amazon has a 6.39% five-year return. Meta also reported a market valuation of $1.84 trillion, $178.8 billion in revenue, and $146.5 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 22.61%. As of October 2, Tesla‚Äôs market value stood at $1.48 trillion, bolstered by $16.2 billion in gross profit and $92.7 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, with a five-year annualized return of 24.38%. Global leaders warn as tech giants drive valuations beyond fundamentals üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ Over 50% of the US market cap is now pure Tech. Defensives have collapsed to under 15%. This isn‚Äôt diversification ‚Äì it‚Äôs a Tech Empire üá∫üá∏üá∫üá∏ $tsla $nvda $google $appl #Bitcoin $qqq pic.twitter.com/taa4SxxSME ‚Äî Hod | Code2Capital (@HodTzdaka) October 3, 2025 David Solomon, CEO of Goldman Sachs, warned on Friday at Italian Tech Week in Turin, that an AI investment frenzy may be overdone and that stock markets are due for a ‚Äúdrawdown.‚Äù Solomon said major US stock indexes have notched record high after record high this year on the promise of artificial intelligence. He argued that there‚Äôs a good chance that not all of those investments will deliver big returns. He noted that the internet craze of the late 1990s and early 2000s drew a frenzy of investment in tech companies at the time. Solomon reminded the crowd that the internet craze was followed by a dramatic collapse, which is commonly known as the ‚Äúdot-com bubble‚Äù. ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if in the next 12 to 24 months, we see a drawdown with respect to equity markets.‚Äù David Solomon , Goldman Sachs CEO Jeff Bezos referred to the AI investment wave as an ‚Äúindustrial bubble.‚Äù He also emphasized that innovation stemming from such AI investment cycles can still yield long-term advantages. According to Bezos, the market is seeking the next big breakthrough, reminiscent of the dynamics of previous bubbles. He added that the previous bubble dynamic is why many small AI ventures with weak foundations receive investment. On October 3, Dario Perkins, TS Lombard‚Äôs Managing Director of Global Macro Research, raised an alarm when he noticed that big tech companies were increasingly using off-balance-sheet loans and special purpose entities (SPVs) to finance AI equipment. According to Perkins, this is a ‚Äúrecognition that this is getting out of hand.‚Äù Perkins emphasized that the real leverage and risk exposure of businesses like Meta, which has requested $29 billion in private finance for the expansion of its AI data centre, are concealed by such borrowing techniques. Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

UNIUSD.title: Solana Price Outlook: Analysts Weigh SOL, XRP, and Little Pepe, Here‚Äôs Which One Will Dominate in 2025
UNIUSD.body: SOL is holding firm at $200 as it battles to stay afloat. Several factors suggest it could rebound soon. Besides Solana, two other projects are contending for dominance: Ripple (XRP) and Little Pepe (LILPEPE) . Each one of them is gaining significant attention in the crypto space. Their setup suggests that they could dominate in 2025. In this article, we will discuss each and find out which one will win in 2025. Solana (SOL): Institutional Magnet With Expanding On-Chain Utility Solana (SOL) trades near $203, after a pullback from earlier-month highs. However, on-chain activity remains robust. Solana‚Äôs Total Value Locked (TVL) stands at around $13‚Äì14 billion, with healthy DEX and perpetual (perp) volumes supporting the network‚Äôs utility. Institutional flows have continued through the correction. The REX-Osprey Solana ETF experienced notable inflows of $65 million in mid-September, despite prices softening. Also, staking-oriented ETF products are expanding institutional access. Recent SEC rule changes have also lowered the bar for spot crypto ETFs, potentially accelerating product launches tied to SOL. Together, these factors suggest SOL could benefit if institutional allocation and on-chain demand persist. Ripple (XRP): Regulatory Clarity Meets Amidst Institutional Demand XRP trades near $2.80 as ETF optimism rises. It has recently partnered with DBS and Franklin Templeton to enable tokenized money-market fund trading on the XRP Ledger. This highlights institutional use cases beyond pure payments. The SEC‚Äôs September rule updates have also made multiple spot-ETF filings more feasible. This increases the odds of XRP-linked products and potential large inflows. Still, analysts caution that ETF approvals alone may not translate into sustained retail rallies unless institutional adoption leads to on-ledger volume and real-world flows. For instance, despite strong volume from the Rex-Osprey XRP ETF, XRP‚Äôs price has only fallen further below. Little Pepe (LILPEPE): Meme Culture Reinvented With Real Utility Little Pepe (LILPEPE) has positioned itself as a new frontier in meme tokens. It combines community-driven appeal with a solid technical foundation. Its presale, now in Stage 13, has already raised over $26.3 million and sold more than 16 billion tokens at $0.0022. This signals a strong early conviction among investors. Little Pepe is powered by Pepe Chain, an Ethereum-compatible Layer-2 built for memes. The chain delivers low gas fees and fast finality. It also offers built-in protections against sniper bots. Its tokenomics are designed to reward sustainability. It includes zero buy/sell tax, staking mechanisms, and a share allocated for ecosystem growth. A key pillar is Pepe‚Äôs Pump Pad, the native launchpad that allows meme projects to deploy directly on the chain. Tokens launched via the pump pad help drive transaction volume, feeding demand back into LILPEPE itself. This creates a looping effect of utility and engagement. Credibility has been bolstered through a successful CertiK audit and listings on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko. On the team side, Little Pepe is backed by anonymous experts with experience in meme project growth. This gives it a level of credibility that‚Äôs easily backed by its roadmap. Planned listings on two Tier-1 centralized exchanges at launch, along with future plans for the world‚Äôs largest exchange, could put LILPEPE in the spotlight as trading begins. Given its lower valuation, strong ecosystem design, and viral potential, Little Pepe may offer higher upside growth curves. SOL vs. XRP vs. LILPEPE: Which One Will Dominate in 2025? Solana offers institutional-grade security and broad infrastructure utilization. This makes it a reliable foundation for numerous blockchain applications. If demand for scalable smart contract platforms continues under regulatory clarity, SOL may capture substantial adoption. XRP‚Äôs strength lies in serving as a regulatory and institutional bridge‚Äîif legal frameworks favor financial token use cases, XRP could benefit strongly. Yet, Little Pepe (LILPEPE) is the wildcard. While SOL and XRP dominate with utility and legitimacy, LILPEPE blends memetic culture and core infrastructure, targeting the meme sector itself. In a cycle that may lean heavily on viral growth and novelty, LILPEPE could outperform in percentage gains. Analysts may see SOL capturing market share and XRP anchoring institutional flows. However, for raw upside, Little Pepe stands as the candidate with the most room to scale. Dominance depends on whether 2025 rewards infrastructure, regulation, or memetic innovation. And LILPEPE is best positioned if meme-utility fusion becomes the narrative. Conclusion Solana, Ripple, and Little Pepe each present a distinct path toward dominance in 2025. SOL combines infrastructure strength and adoption. On the other hand, XRP bridges financial legitimacy with crypto access. But it is Little Pepe that merges meme culture with technical depth, offering potentially explosive growth. Though it carries a higher risk, its robust presale performance, ecosystem development, and launchpad mechanics provide it with the framework to compete meaningfully. For investors seeking asymmetric upside in the meme sector, Little Pepe deserves serious consideration. Visit the Little Pepe website or join its Telegram to stay ahead of listings and developments. LTCUSD.title: Big Move: Ethereum Foundation Trades $4.5M ETH For Stable Assets
LTCUSD.body: Ethereum‚Äôs steward moved part of its crypto coffers this week, converting a chunk of ETH into stablecoins as it adjusts how it funds projects and grants. Foundation Moves To Stablecoin Holdings According to reports, the Ethereum Foundation converted 1,000 ETH into stablecoins using the decentralized trading router CoW Swap, a transaction worth about $4.5 million at the time. The move was executed as part of the foundation‚Äôs ongoing treasury actions and was presented as a step to secure more predictable funds for research, grants, and donations. The specific stablecoin or coins received in exchange were not publicly named in initial reports. The Foundation‚Äôs treasurer has been managing a broader plan. Reports have disclosed a previously stated intention to convert up to 10,000 Ether over a period of weeks, and this latest trade appears to be an element of that phased approach rather than a one-off sale. Holding stable assets gives the foundation a clearer view of its short-term spending power while it evaluates longer-term strategy. 1/ Today, The Ethereum Foundation will convert 1000 ETH to stablecoins via @CoWSwap ‚Äòs TWAP feature, as part of our ongoing work to fund R&D, grants and donations, and to highlight the power of DeFi. ‚Äî Ethereum Foundation (@ethereumfndn) October 3, 2025 Use Of Decentralized Trading Tools The choice to use CoW Swap ‚Äî a decentralized aggregator that aims to reduce slippage and market impact ‚Äî was highlighted in public coverage. By routing the trade through decentralized infrastructure instead of a single centralized exchange, the Foundation reduced some counterparty and custody concerns. The execution method was described as careful and aimed at protecting the value of the sale during the swap. Alongside the transaction, internal operational decisions have also been articulated. The Foundation indicated it temporarily applied the breaks on open submissions of a grant for its Ecosystem Support Program in order to give attention to the large influx of proposals and prioritize urgent or high-impact work. Changes in leadership and institutional reorganization, have also been discussed publicly as part of recent organizational action, portrayed in a manner that suggests a transition is underway internally to accompany any change in the direction of treasury management as well. What Comes Next For The Treasury Market watchers noted that converting ETH to stablecoins is a common liquidity-management tactic. Volatility in ETH‚Äôs price can make budgeting for multi-month support programs difficult; stable assets can smooth out planning. While some community members saw the sale as a reduction of ETH holdings, others pointed out that the foundation‚Äôs core mission ‚Äî to support Ethereum‚Äôs development ‚Äî remains unchanged.
